content: in the next stitch make an increase * 1 double_crochet in each of the next 3 stitches 2 double_crochet in the next stitch continue from * join 105 double_crochet in total round 2 chain 1 fpsc around the previous stitch chain 1 1 double_crochet in each of the next 3 stitches 2 double_crochet in the next stitch make an increase * 1 double_crochet in each of the next 4 stitches 2 double_crochet in the next stitch continue from * 126 double_crochet round 3 chain 1 fpsc around the previous stitch chain 1 1 double_crochet in each stitches around 126 double_crochet round 4 chain 1 fpsc around the previous stitch chain 1 1 double_crochet in each of the next 4 stitches 2 double_crochet in the next stitch make an increase * 1 double_crochet in each of the next 5 stitches 2 double_crochet in the next stitch continue from * 147 double_crochet round 5 chain 1 fpsc around the previous stitch chain 1 1 double_crochet in each stitches around 147 double_crochet slip_stitch or reverse single_crochet all around to make the brim stronger flower pattern this flower has three layers three particular flowers are stacked from big to small the flower with big petals make a magic_ring round 1 chain 3 count as a double_crochet chain 1 double_crochet in the loop chain 9 join with slip_stitch to the first chain chain 1 *double_crochet chain 1 double_crochet chain 9 join with slip_stitch to the first chain 2 chain 1 repeat from * 4 times join with slip_stitch to the first chain-3 12 double_crochet and chain- 1 space 6 chain-9 loops in total round 2 chain 1 single_crochet in the same stitch * work 14 double_crochet in the chain-9 loop single_crochet in the next double_crochet repeat from * 5 times join with slip_stitch to the first single_crochet fasten_off the smaller one magic_ring chain 1 * single_crochet in the loop chain 6 1 half_double_crochet in the third chain from hook 1 double_crochet in each of the next 3 stitches repeat from * 5 times join with slip_stitch to the first single_crochet 6 petals in total fasten_off the smallest one magic_ring * chain 8 slip_stitch in the loop repeat from * 4 times 5 petals in total fasten_off assembling put these flowers in order they should be done with the smallest one on top sew in place in the center sew it to the hat using the photo in my blog as a guide if you like making it that way
